<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the Participant&#8217;s Disability,
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">

	(d)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	a partial termination of the Plan which is effective as to the Participant, or
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	a complete termination of the Plan or a complete discontinuance of Employer contributions hereto.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S7BF8C1C74B513D9EE36823E3BA100F6F">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	5.1.3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Full Vesting Upon Plan Termination Before Forfeiture Event
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. If a Participant is not in the employment of the Employer or an Affiliate upon a complete termination of the Plan or a complete discontinuance of Employer contributions hereto, then the Participant&#8217;s Employer Profit Sharing Account and Pension Account shall become fully (100%) vested if, on the date of such termination or discontinuance, such Participant has not had a &#8220;forfeiture event&#8221; as described in Section&#160;6.2.1 of the Plan.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S2CBAFFF3623C9CDC183E23E3BA422C3C">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	5.1.4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Special Rule for Partial Distributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. If a distribution is made of less than the entire Employer Profit Sharing Account or Pension Account of a Participant who is not then fully (100%) vested, then until the Participant&#8217;s Employer Profit Sharing Account or Pension Account becomes fully (100%) vested or until the Participant incurs five (5) or more consecutive One&#8209;Year Breaks in Service, whichever first occurs, (i)&#160;a separate account shall be established for the portion of the Employer Profit Sharing Account or Pension Account not so distributed and (ii)&#160;the Participant&#8217;s Vested interest in such account at any relevant time shall not be less than an amount (&#8220;X&#8221;) determined by the formula: X = P(B + (R x D))&#160;&#8209; (R x D). For the purpose of applying the formula, &#8220;P&#8221; is the Vested percentage at the relevant time (determined pursuant to Section&#160;5); &#8220;B&#8221; is the separate account balance at the relevant time; &#8220;D&#8221; is the amount of the distribution; and &#8220;R&#8221; is the ratio of the separate account balance at the relevant time to the Employer Profit Sharing Account or Pension Account balance immediately after distribution.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_SDA42758847C56C34E73C23E3BA640B7B">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	5.1.5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Effect of Break on Vesting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. If a Participant who is not fully (100%) vested incurs a Period of Severance of five (5) years, returns to Recognized Employment and is thereafter eligible for any additional allocation of Employer contributions, the Participant&#8217;s undistributed Employer Profit Sharing Account or Pension Account, if any, attributable to Employer contributions allocated as of a date before such Period of Severance of five (5) years and the Participant&#8217;s new Employer Profit Sharing Account attributable to Employer contributions allocated as of a date after such Period of Severance of five (5) years shall be separately maintained for vesting purposes until the Participant is fully (100%) Vested.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S19D4532B0BC5D7D7542323E3BA984CF2">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	5.2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Other Accounts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. Each Participant&#8217;s Retirement Savings Account, Roth Account, Employer Matching Account, ESOP Account, QNEC Account, Rollover Account, Roth Rollover Account, and After-Tax Account shall be fully (100%) vested at all times.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S3B5EB6B3EBBFC9F33AF823E3BAB72120">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:14PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:14PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION 6&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:14PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;
<BR>
	MATURITY
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S2AAED76304BB5C66729A23E3BAEFD5C0">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Events of Maturity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. A Participant&#8217;s Vested Total Account shall mature and shall become distributable in accordance with Section&#160;7 upon the earliest occurrence of any of the following events while in the employment of the Employer or an Affiliate:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the Participant&#8217;s death,
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the Participant&#8217;s severance from employment, whether voluntary or involuntary,
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the attainment of age seventy and one&#8209;half (70&#189;) years by a Participant who is a five percent (5%) owner (as defined in Appendix&#160;B) at any time during the year in which the Participant attained age seventy and one&#8209;half (70&#189;) years and the crediting of any amounts to such a Participant&#8217;s Account after such time, or
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the Participant&#8217;s Disability;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	provided, however, that a transfer from Recognized Employment to employment with the Employer that is other than Recognized Employment or a transfer from the employment of one Employer participating in the Plan to another such Employer or to any Affiliate shall not constitute an Event of Maturity.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S35F06FFB91DBC32791C623E3BB095F52">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Forfeitures
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S56623EE725A9B12D8CDC23E3BB3BC813">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.2.1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Forfeiture of Nonvested Portion of Accounts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. Following the occurrence of a Participant&#8217;s Event of Maturity, the non&#8209;Vested portion of the Participant&#8217;s Employer Profit Sharing Account or Pension Account, if any, shall be forfeited as soon as administratively practicable on or after the Participant&#8217;s forfeiture event. A forfeiture event shall occur with respect to a Participant upon the earliest of:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	a Period of Severance of five (5) years,
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the distribution after an Event of Maturity to (or with respect to) a Participant of the entire Vested portion of the Total Account of the Participant,
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the death of the Participant at a time and under circumstances which do not entitle the Participant to be fully (100%) Vested in the Participant&#8217;s Total Account, or
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the Event of Maturity of a Participant who has no Vested interest in the Participant&#8217;s Total Account.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_SC894C1B13CCBA4A09B6E23E3BB5C4389">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.2.2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Restoration Upon Rehire After Forfeiture
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. If the Participant returns to Recognized Employment with the Employer or an Affiliate after the non&#8209;Vested portion of the Participant&#8217;s Employer Profit Sharing Account or Pension Account has been forfeited and before the Participant has incurred a Period of Severance of five (5) years, the amount so forfeited shall be restored to the Participant&#8217;s Employer Profit Sharing Account or Pension Account as of the Valuation Date coincident with or next following the date the Participant returns (without adjustment for gains or losses after such forfeiture).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S1E1ECDE2E9C4946A2B2123E3BB8EE90E">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.2.3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Use of Forfeitures
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. Forfeitures shall be used to reduce Employer contributions and, to the extent remaining, to pay Plan expenses. Forfeitures shall not be used to increase benefits; provided, that any forfeitures remaining at the termination of the Plan shall be considered to be a discretionary contribution and shall be allocated pursuant to Section&#160;3.4.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S5A6743F90DE11101CD6823E3BBAFEB6B">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.2.4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Source of Restoration
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. The amount necessary to make the restoration required under Section&#160;6.2.2 shall come first from the forfeitures of Participants. If such forfeitures are not adequate for this purpose, the rehiring Employer shall make a contribution adequate to make the restoration (in addition to any contributions made under Section&#160;3).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_SC2325829FE56D54999A623E3BBE44375">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:14PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:14PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION 7&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:14PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;
<BR>
	DISTRIBUTIONS AND LOANS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_SEB863E812960431EEB8623E3BC05C141">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Distributions to Participants Upon Event of Maturity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S9DAC0FB8017408D41E1E23E3BC36CD76">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.1.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Application For Distribution Required
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. No distribution shall be made from the Plan until the Committee has received an application for distribution from the Participant entitled to receive distribution. The Committee may prescribe rules regarding the form of such application, the method of filing such application (including telephonic, electronic or similar methods) and the information required to be furnished in connection with such application.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exception for Small Amounts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. If a Participant whose Vested Total Account does not exceed One Thousand Dollars ($1,000) incurs an Event of Maturity, then such Vested Total Account shall be distributed automatically in a single lump sum as soon as administratively practicable following such Event of Maturity without an application for distribution. A Participant who has no Vested interest in the Participant&#8217;s Total Account as of the Participant&#8217;s Event of Maturity shall be deemed to have received an immediate distribution of the Participant&#8217;s entire interest in the Plan as of such Event of Maturity.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exception for Required Minimum Distributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Any Vested Total Account for which no application has been timely received on or before the required beginning date effective as to a Participant under Section&#160;7.1.5 or Section&#160;7.1.6, shall be distributed in accordance with Section 7.7 of the Plan without an application for distribution.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S011F9E3A1D8ADA6B4A8823E3BC570E0E">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.1.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Spousal Consent Not Required
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. The consent of a Participant&#8217;s spouse shall not be required to make distributions from the Plan (except for distributions from the Pension Account as set forth in Appendix&#160;E to the Plan).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S83332B2324C25543E4B423E3BC89B491">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.1.3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Form of Distribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. The only form of distribution available under this Plan is a lump sum payment (except required minimum distributions made pursuant to Sections 7.1.1(b) and 7.7 of the Plan and distributions from the Pension Account as set forth in Appendix&#160;E to the Plan).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_SEF1BEE1998D11A0A2D2223E3BCAB6C4D">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.1.4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Time of Distribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. Upon the receipt of a proper application from the Participant requesting distribution after an Event of Maturity, and after the right of the Participant to receive a distribution has been established, the Committee shall cause the Trustee to determine the value of the Participant&#8217;s Vested Total Account and to make distribution of such Vested Total Account in a single lump sum as soon as administratively practicable after the Participant requests a distribution. No distribution, however, shall be made as of a Valuation Date preceding the date the Participant&#8217;s application is received by the Committee.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_SDC914EB5348BF377E7E423E3BCEA1D6B">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.1.5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Required Beginning Date for Non&#8209;Five Percent (5%) Owners
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8209;. Notwithstanding the foregoing, distribution to the Participant shall be made not later than the required beginning date, which is the later of (i)&#160;the April&#160;1 following the calendar year in which the Participant attains age seventy and one&#8209;half (70&#189;) years, or (ii)&#160;the April&#160;1 following the calendar year in which the Participant terminates employment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S7866D385102B27A9FB8923E3BD09CDBE">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.1.6.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Required Beginning Date for Five Percent (5%) Owners
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. Notwithstanding any other provision of the Plan, if the Participant is a five percent (5%) owner (as defined in Appendix&#160;B) at any time during the Plan Year in which such Participant attains age seventy and one&#8209;half (70&#189;) years, distribution shall not be made later than the April&#160;1 following the calendar year in which the Participant attains age seventy and one&#8209;half (70&#189;) years.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_SFE2351A635EF0036D8CB23E3BD306C34">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.1.7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Effect of Reemployment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. If a Participant is reemployed by the Employer or an Affiliate before the Participant attains Normal Retirement Age and before distribution is completed, the Participant&#8217;s Vested Total Account shall continue to be held in the Fund until the Participant incurs another Event of Maturity after the Participant&#8217;s reemployment. It is the general intent of this Plan that no distributions shall be made before the Normal Retirement Age of a Participant while the Participant is employed by the Employer or an Affiliate.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_SF7174C2EB04894A8566623E3BD512781">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.1.8.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Death Prior to Distribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. If a Participant dies after the Participant&#8217;s Event of Maturity but before distribution of the Participant&#8217;s Vested Total Account has been completed, the undistributed Vested Total Account shall be distributed to the Participant&#8217;s Beneficiary as provided in Section&#160;7.3 and Appendix&#160;E to the Plan.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S80D78020833BE48BE9E023E3BD860560">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	In&#8209;Service Distributions and Hardship Distributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8209;.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S3D8D76239EFBD70D5F7423E3BDA5377B">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.2.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Age 59&#189; Distributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. A Participant may receive a distribution while employed from the vested portion of the Accounts listed in (b) below if the Participant has attained age fifty&#8209;nine and one&#8209;half (59&#189;) years. To receive such a distribution, the Participant must apply to the Committee. In the application, the Participant shall specify the dollar amount to be distributed. Such distribution shall be approved by the Committee and such distribution shall be made in a lump sum cash payment as soon as administratively practicable following the approval of the application by the Committee.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Spousal Consent Not Required
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Spousal consent shall not be required to make an age 59&#189; distribution to a married Participant.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Accounting for Age 59&#189; Distributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. In the application, the Participant shall specify the extent to which the age 59&#189; distribution is to be made from his Roth Account. Except to the extent the Participant has specified that the age 59&#189; distribution is to be made from the Participant&#8217;s Roth Account, any such distribution shall be taken pro rata from the following Accounts of the Participant:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Rollover Account
<BR>
	Employer Matching Account
<BR>
	Employer Profit Sharing Account
<BR>
	Retirement Savings Account
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	QNEC Account.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Coordination with Section&#160;4.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. If a distribution is made from an Account which is invested in more than one (1) Subfund authorized and established under Section&#160;4.1, the amount distributed shall be charged to each Subfund in the same proportions as the Account is invested in each Subfund.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_SCD5C3502DC6D2E15F4AF23E3BDD872D8">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.2.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Hardship Distributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. A Participant may receive a hardship distribution while employed from the Accounts listed in (e) below if the Committee determines that such hardship distribution is for one of the purposes described in (a) below and the conditions in (b) and (d) below have been fulfilled. To receive such a distribution, the Participant must apply to the Committee. In the application, the Participant shall specify the dollar amount to be distributed. Such hardship distribution shall be approved by the Committee and such hardship distribution shall be made in a lump sum cash payment as soon as administratively practicable following the approval of the application by the Committee.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Purposes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Hardship distributions shall be allowed under Section&#160;7.2.2 of the Plan only if the Participant establishes that the hardship distribution is to be made for one of the following purposes:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:132PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-132PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	expenses for (or necessary to obtain) medical care for the Participant, the Participant&#8217;s spouse or any dependents of the Participant (as defined in section&#160;152 of the Code and without regard to sections 152(b)(1), 152(b)(2) and 152(d)(1)(B) of the Code) that would be deductible under section&#160;213(d) of the Code (determined without regard to whether the expenses exceed seven and one-half (7.5%) of adjusted gross income),
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:132PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-132PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	costs directly related to the purchase of a principal residence for the Participant (excluding mortgage payments),
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	payment of tuition, room and board and related educational fees for the next twelve (12) months of post&#8209;secondary education for the Participant, or the Participant&#8217;s spouse, children or dependents (as defined in section&#160;152 of the Code and without regard to sections 152(b)(1), 152(b)(2) and 152(d)(1)(B) of the Code),
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	(iv)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:132PX;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	payments necessary to prevent the eviction of the Participant from the Participant&#8217;s principal residence or foreclosure on the mortgage of that principal residence;
</FONT>
</DIV>

</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	payments for burial or funeral expenses of the Participant&#8217;s deceased parent, spouse, children or dependents (as defined in section 152 of the Code and without regard to section 152(d)(1)(B) of the Code), or
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(vi)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:132PX;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	expenses for the repair of damage to the Participant&#8217;s principal residence that would qualify for the casualty deduction under section 165 of the Code (determined without regard to whether the loss exceeds ten percent (10%) of adjusted gross income).
</FONT>
</DIV>

</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Such purposes shall be considered to be an immediate and heavy financial need of the Participant.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Limitations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. In no event shall the cumulative amount of hardship distributions withdrawn exceed the amount of contributions to a Participant&#8217;s Retirement Savings Account or Roth Account made pursuant to Section&#160;3.2 (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	i.e.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	,&#160;hardship distributions shall not include any earnings on such contributions or any qualified nonelective contributions (as defined under section&#160;401(m)(4)(C)) or earnings on such qualified nonelective contributions). The amount of the hardship distribution shall not exceed the amount of the Participant&#8217;s immediate and heavy financial need; provided, however, that the amount of the immediate and heavy financial need may include amounts necessary to pay any federal, state, or local income taxes or penalties reasonably anticipated to result from the distribution. In addition, a hardship distribution which includes a portion of the Participant&#8217;s Retirement Savings Account or Roth Account shall not be allowed unless the Participant has obtained all distributions, including distribution of ESOP dividends under section 404(k) of the Code but not including other hardship distributions, and all nontaxable loans (at the time of the loan) currently available under all plans maintained by the Employer and Affiliates. Other funds are not currently available unless the funds are available prior to or coincidently with the date the hardship distribution is available.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Spousal Consent Not Required
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Spousal consent shall not be required to make a hardship distribution to a married Participant.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Coordination with Other Plans
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. The Participant&#8217;s Retirement Savings Election and elective contributions and employee contributions under all other plans maintained by the Employer and Affiliates shall be canceled for six (6) months after receipt of a hardship distribution. Following the completion of that six (6) month period the Participant&#8217;s Retirement Savings Election shall be automatically reinstated, provided the Participant is in Recognized Employment on that date. For the purposes of this Section&#160;7.2.2(d), all other plans maintained by the Employer and Affiliates shall mean all qualified and nonqualified plans of deferred compensation maintained by the Employer and Affiliates (including stock option, stock purchase or similar plans).
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Sequence of Accounts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Each hardship distribution made pursuant to this Section&#160;7.2.2 shall first be taken from and charged to the Participant&#8217;s Accounts in the following sequence:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Retirement Savings Account
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Roth Account.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Coordination with Section&#160;4.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. If the hardship distribution is made from a Retirement Savings Account or a Roth Account which is invested in more than one (1) Subfund authorized and established under Section&#160;4.1, the amount withdrawn shall be charged to each Subfund in the same proportions as the Retirement Savings Account is invested in each Subfund.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S19135219009E946BD1DB23E3BDF9FF49">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.2.3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;General In&#8209;Service Withdrawals
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8209;. A Participant who is an employee may receive an in&#8209;service withdrawal from time to time from the Accounts listed in Section&#160;7.2.3(b) of the Plan. To receive such a distribution, the Participant must apply to the Committee. In the application, the Participant shall specify the dollar amount to be distributed. Such distribution shall be approved by the Committee and such distribution shall be made in a lump sum cash payment as soon as administratively practicable following the approval of the application by the Committee.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Limitations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. The following rules and limitations shall apply to in&#8209;service withdrawals. No in&#8209;service withdrawal shall be made from any portion of a Participant&#8217;s Total Account that is invested in a self&#8209;managed brokerage Subfund authorized and established under Section&#160;4.1 of the Plan. No in&#8209;service withdrawal shall be made from any portion of a Participant&#8217;s Total Account that consists of the unpaid balance of any outstanding loans of the Participant under Section&#160;7 of the Plan.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Accounting for In-Service Distributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. In the application, the Participant shall specify the extent to which the in-service distribution is to be made from the Participant&#8217;s After-Tax Account. Except to the extent the Participant has specified that the in-service distribution is to be made from the Participant&#8217;s After-Tax Account, any such distribution shall first be taken from and charged to the Participant&#8217;s Accounts in the following sequence:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Rollover Account
<BR>
	Roth Rollover Account.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Any general in&#8209;service distribution shall be deemed to have been taken from a combination of (i)&#160;the Participant&#8217;s after&#8209;tax contributions to the After&#8209;Tax Account, to the extent of the aggregate amount thereof not previously withdrawn, and (ii)&#160;the earnings in the After&#8209;Tax Account and all contributions and all earnings in all other Accounts. The portion of each such in&#8209;service withdrawal that is deemed to be earnings will be in the same ratio as the earnings in the After&#8209;Tax Account and all contributions and all earnings in all other Accounts bear to the Total Account.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Investment in More Than One Subfund
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. If an in&#8209;service withdrawal is made from an Account which is invested in more than one&#160;(1) Subfund, the amount withdrawn shall be charged to each Subfund in the same proportions as the Account (minus any portion of the Account invested in a self&#8209;managed brokerage Subfund) is invested in each Subfund.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S3879691CA7359B01342523E3BE29630D">
</A>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.2.4.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Withdrawals During Military Leave
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	30-Day Leave Withdrawal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. A Participant who is on active military duty (as defined under Code Section 3401(h)(2)(A)) for more than thirty (30) days (&#8220;Military Leave Participant&#8221;) shall be eligible to elect to receive a distribution of all or a portion of his Retirement Savings Account, QNEC Account, Employer Matching Account, and Roth Account (in that order) pursuant to this Section 7.2.4.(a). In the event of an election by the Military Leave Participant under this section 7.2.4.(a), the Trustee shall, upon direction of the Plan Administrator, distribute all or a portion of such Participant&#8217;s Retirement Savings Account, QNEC Account, Employer Matching Account, and Roth Account (in that order) during such leave. However, a Military Leave Participant who elects to receive a distribution under this Section 7.2.4.(a) shall be prohibited from making Elective Contributions to the Plan for the six (6) month period beginning on the date of the distribution. A distribution pursuant to this Section 7.2.4.(a) shall be made from the above-referenced accounts in the order listed.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Qualified Reservist Distribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. A Participant who, by reason of being a member of a reserve component (as defined in Section 101 of Title 37 of the U.S. Code), is ordered or called to active duty for a period in excess of 179 days or for an indefinite period may request a distribution of all or a portion of his Retirement Savings Account and his Roth Account; provided that such distribution is made during the period that begins on the date of such order, and ends at the close of the active military duty period. A distribution pursuant to this Section 7.2.4.(b) shall be made first from the Participant&#8217;s Retirement Savings Account, and then from his Roth Account.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S38D18FA8398658453B2123E3BE4BCC2E">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Distributions to Beneficiary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_SD32D5EEB2C97A784FEA523E3BE7DAAD9">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.3.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Application For Distribution Required
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. No distribution shall be made from the Plan until the Committee has received an application for distribution from the Beneficiary of a Participant entitled to receive distribution. The Committee may prescribe rules regarding the form of such application, the method of filing such application (including telephonic, electronic or similar methods) and the information required to be furnished in connection with such application.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exception for Small Amounts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Upon the death of a Participant whose Vested Total Account does not exceed One Thousand Dollars ($1,000), such Participant&#8217;s Vested Total Account shall be distributed to the Beneficiary in a single lump sum as soon as administratively practicable following such Participant&#8217;s death without an application for distribution.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exception for Required Minimum Distributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Any Vested Total Account for which no application has been timely received on or before the required beginning date effective as to a Beneficiary under Section&#160;7.3.4, shall be distributed in accordance with Section 7.7 of the Plan without an application for distribution.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_SE586AB4C64DC4137CBD023E3BE9E9B69">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.3.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Form of Distribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. The only form of distribution available under this Plan is a lump sum payment (except for required minimum distributions made pursuant to Section 7.3.1(b) and Section 7.7 of the Plan).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S218F8EC262730C1ABE4023E3BEDC0AEE">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.3.3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Time of Distribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. Upon the receipt of a proper application for distribution from the Beneficiary after the Participant&#8217;s death, and after the right of the Beneficiary to receive a distribution has been established, the Committee shall cause the Trustee to determine the value of the Participant&#8217;s Vested Total Account and to make distribution of such Vested Total Account in a single lump sum as soon as administratively practicable after the Beneficiary requests a distribution. No distribution, however, shall be made as of a Valuation Date preceding the date the Beneficiary&#8217;s application is received by the Committee.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_SA181AF7747D25C7B6ABD23E3BEF1ADD0">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.3.4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Required Beginning Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. Notwithstanding any other provision of the Plan, distribution to the Beneficiary of a Participant shall be made in accordance with Section 7.7 of the Plan.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S25BF8B63FD46E320606123E3BF246A70">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Designation of Beneficiaries
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S1BC6A837804932C01BEF23E3BF46E7F4">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.4.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Right To Designate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. Each Participant may designate, upon forms to be furnished by and filed with the Committee, one or more primary Beneficiaries or alternative Beneficiaries to receive all or a specified part of the Participant&#8217;s Vested Total Account in the event of the Participant&#8217;s death. The Participant may change or revoke any such designation from time to time without notice to or consent from any Beneficiary or spouse. No such designation, change or revocation shall be effective unless executed by the Participant and received by the Committee during the Participant&#8217;s lifetime.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S576ADCCED382C561CC2423E3BF7816A6">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.4.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Spousal Consent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. Notwithstanding the foregoing, a designation will not be valid for the purpose of paying benefits from the Plan to anyone other than a surviving spouse of the Participant (if there is a surviving spouse) unless that surviving spouse consents in writing to the designation of another person as Beneficiary. To be valid, the consent of such spouse must be in writing, must acknowledge the effect of the designation of the Beneficiary and must be witnessed by a notary public. The consent of the spouse must be to the designation of a specific named Beneficiary which may not be changed without further spousal consent, or alternatively, the consent of the spouse must expressly permit the Participant to make and to change the designation of Beneficiaries without any requirement of further spousal consent. The consent of the spouse to a Beneficiary is a waiver of the spouse&#8217;s rights to death benefits under the Plan. The consent of the surviving spouse need not be given at the time the designation is made. The consent of the surviving spouse need not be given before the death of the Participant. The consent of the surviving spouse will be required, however, before benefits can be paid to any person other than the surviving spouse. The consent of a spouse shall be irrevocable and shall be effective only with respect to that spouse.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_SDDC43FF3139492A24A2723E3BF999A26">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.4.3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Failure of Designation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. If a Participant:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	fails to designate a Beneficiary,
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	designates a Beneficiary and thereafter such designation is revoked without another Beneficiary being named, or
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	designates one or more Beneficiaries and all such Beneficiaries so designated fail to survive the Participant,
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	such Participant&#8217;s Vested Total Account, or the part thereof as to which such Participant&#8217;s designation fails, as the case may be, shall be payable to the first class of the following classes of automatic Beneficiaries with a member surviving the Participant and (except in the case of the Participant&#8217;s surviving issue) in equal shares if there is more than one member in such class surviving the Participant:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:64PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Participant&#8217;s surviving spouse
<BR>
	Participant&#8217;s surviving issue per&#160;stirpes and not per capita
<BR>
	Participant&#8217;s surviving parents
<BR>
	Participant&#8217;s surviving brothers and sisters
<BR>
	Representative of Participant&#8217;s estate.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S9705D6B413DE86AE743523E3BFCB87B9">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.4.4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Disclaimers by Beneficiaries
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. A Beneficiary entitled to a distribution of all or a portion of a deceased Participant&#8217;s Vested Total Account may disclaim his or her interest therein subject to the following requirements. To be eligible to disclaim, a Beneficiary must be a natural person, must not have received a distribution of all or any portion of a Vested Total Account at the time such disclaimer is executed and delivered, and must have attained at least age twenty&#8209;one (21) years as of the date of the Participant&#8217;s death. Any disclaimer must be in writing and must be executed personally by the Beneficiary before a notary public. A disclaimer shall state that the Beneficiary&#8217;s entire interest in the undistributed Vested Total Account is disclaimed or shall specify what portion thereof is disclaimed. To be effective, duplicate original executed copies of the disclaimer must be both executed and actually delivered to both the Committee and to the Trustee after the date of the Participant&#8217;s death but not later than nine (9) months after the date of the Participant&#8217;s death. A disclaimer shall be irrevocable when delivered to both the Committee and the Trustee. A disclaimer shall be considered to be delivered to the Committee or the Trustee only when actually received by the Committee or the Trustee (and in the case of a corporate Trustee, shall be considered to be delivered only when actually received by a trust officer familiar with the affairs of the Plan). The Committee (and not the Trustee) shall be the sole judge of the content, interpretation and validity of a purported disclaimer. Upon the filing of a valid disclaimer, the Beneficiary shall be considered not to have survived the Participant as to the interest disclaimed. A disclaimer by a Beneficiary shall not be considered to be a transfer of an interest in violation of the provisions of Section&#160;8 of the Plan and shall not be considered to be an assignment or alienation of benefits in violation of federal law prohibiting the assignment or alienation of benefits under this Plan. No other form of attempted disclaimer shall be recognized by either the Committee or the Trustee.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S90BBDF29A72FC3783CF123E3BFEBF761">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.4.5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Definitions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. When used herein and, unless the Participant has otherwise specified in the Participant&#8217;s Beneficiary designation, when used in a Beneficiary designation, &#8220;issue&#8221; means all persons who are lineal descendants of the person whose issue are referred to, subject to the following:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	a legally adopted child and the adopted child&#8217;s lineal descendants always shall be lineal descendants of each adoptive parent (and of each adoptive parent&#8217;s lineal ancestors);
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	a legally adopted child and the adopted child&#8217;s lineal descendants never shall be lineal descendants of any former parent whose parental rights were terminated by the adoption (or of that former parent&#8217;s lineal ancestors); except that if, after a child&#8217;s parent has died, the child is legally adopted by a stepparent who is the spouse of the child&#8217;s surviving parent, the child and the child&#8217;s lineal descendants shall remain lineal descendants of the deceased parent (and the deceased parent&#8217;s lineal ancestors);
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	if the person (or a lineal descendant of the person) whose issue are referred to is the parent of a child (or is treated as such under applicable law) but never received the child into that parent&#8217;s home and never openly held out the child as that parent&#8217;s child (unless doing so was precluded solely by death), then neither the child nor the child&#8217;s lineal descendants shall be issue of the person.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8220;Child&#8221; means an issue of the first generation; &#8220;per&#160;stirpes&#8221; means in equal shares among living children of the person whose issue are referred to and the issue (taken collectively) of each deceased child of such person, with such issue taking by right of representation of such deceased child; and &#8220;survive&#8221; and &#8220;surviving&#8221; mean living after the death of the Participant.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="ENTG-12312016XEX101_HTM_S294929A43D5235D1CB3323E3C01DB08D">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:60PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.4.6.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Special Rules
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;. Unless the Participant has otherwise specified in the Participant&#8217;s Beneficiary designation, the following rules shall apply:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	If there is not sufficient evidence that a Beneficiary was living at the time of the death of the Participant, it shall be deemed that the Beneficiary was not living at the time of the death of the Participant.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The automatic Beneficiaries specified in Section&#160;7.4.3 and the Beneficiaries designated by the Participant shall become fixed at the time of the Participant&#8217;s death so that, if a Beneficiary survives the Participant but dies before the receipt of all payments due such Beneficiary hereunder, such remaining payments shall be payable to the representative of such Beneficiary&#8217;s estate.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	If the Participant designates as a Beneficiary the person who is the Participant&#8217;s spouse on the date of the designation, either by name or by relationship, or both, the dissolution, annulment or other legal termination of the marriage between the Participant and such person shall automatically revoke such designation. (The foregoing shall not prevent the Participant from designating a former spouse as a Beneficiary on a form executed by the Participant and received by the Committee after the date of the legal termination of the marriage between the Participant and such former spouse, and during the Participant&#8217;s lifetime.)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Any designation of a nonspouse Beneficiary by name that is accompanied by a description of relationship to the Participant shall be given effect without regard to whether the relationship to the Participant exists either then or at the Participant&#8217;s death.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:60PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:60PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:84PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-INDENT:-84PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Any designation of a Beneficiary only by statement of relationship to the Participant shall be effective only to designate the person or persons standing in such relationship to the Participant at the Participant&#8217;s death.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
